text: Hafiz Uddin Ahmed is a Bangladesh Jatiya Party politician and the former Member of Parliament from Thakurgaon-3. ==Early life== Ahmed was born on 3 February 1946. He studied till completing his HSC. ==Career== Ahmed was elected to parliament in 2001 as a candidate of Jatiya Party from Thakurgaon-3. He was re-elected in 2008 Bangladesh General Election as a candidate of Bangladesh Awami League led Grand Alliance. ==References== Category:Bangladesh Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Hafiz Uddin Ahmed
